mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS c FROM personwash_tasklist AS a

SELECT a.* FROM personwash_tasklist a
ORDER BY ${page.order} ${page.direction} LIMIT ${page.startNo}, ${page.limit}
SELECT a.* FROM personwash_tasklist a WHERE a.id = #{taskId}
mapper.insert: insert into personwash_tasklist( TASK_NAME, TASK_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, VIRTUAL_FEEDBACK_TIME, CHECK_INTERN, ITEM_COUNT, CHECK_TIMES, CHECK_STATUS, REAL_FEEDBACK_TIME, VALIDATE_TIME, RECORD_COUNT ) values( #{taskName}, '0', now(), #{virtualFeedbackTime}, #{checkIntern}, #{itemCount}, 0, '0', #{realFeedbackTime}, #{validateTime}, #{recordCount} )
mapper.select: SELECT field_name FROM personwash_temporary_save WHERE check_id = #{checkId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM personwash_temporary_save WHERE check_id IN ( SELECT CHECK_ID FROM personwash_task_to_check_data_relation WHERE TASK_ID = #{taskId} )
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( concat( truncate(truncate(x / y, 5) * 100, 3), '%' ), concat(0, '%') ) AS r FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(sum(a.CL_COUNT), 0) x, 1 AS z FROM urlcontent_check_2017 a WHERE a.ID IN ( SELECT CHECK_ID FROM personwash_task_to_check_data_relation WHERE TASK_ID = #{taskId} ) AND a.CL_REVIEW_STATUS = 1 ) u LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b.ITEM_COUNT y, 1 AS z FROM personwash_tasklist b WHERE b.ID = #{taskId} ) o ) k ON u.z = k.z
mapper.update: UPDATE urlcontent_check_2017 SET CL_WORK_STATUS = 0, CL_REVIEW_STATUS = 0 WHERE ID IN ( SELECT CHECK_ID FROM personwash_task_to_check_data_relation WHERE TASK_ID = #{taskId} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS c FROM urlcontent_check_2017 a WHERE a.ID IN ( SELECT CHECK_ID FROM personwash_task_to_check_data_relation WHERE TASK_ID = #{taskId} ) AND a.CL_WORK_STATUS != 1;
SELECT a.* FROM urlcontent_check_2017 a WHERE a.ID IN ( SELECT c.CHECK_ID FROM personwash_task_to_check_data_relation c WHERE c.TASK_ID = #{taskId} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE radar2.${tableName} t

UPDATE personwash_tasklist SET REAL_QUERY_ITEM_COUNT = #{realQueryItemCount}, REAL_FINISHED_ITEM_COUNT = #{realFinishedItemCount}, REAL_QUERY_RECORD_COUNT = #{realQueryRecordCount}, REAL_FINISHED_RECORD_COUNT = #{realFinishedRecordCount}, WORK_LOAD = #{workLoad} WHERE ID = #{id}
